name: TESTING AT HOME COALITION FKA AT-HOME COVID TESTING (ACT) COALITION
description: An effort on behalf of diagnostics developers to seek broad access to at home COVID tests.
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Seeking Medicare coverage and payment for in vitro diagnostic tests for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 or the diagnosis of the virus that causes COVID-19.
Seeking Medicare coverage and payment for in vitro diagnostic tests for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 or the diagnosis of the virus that causes COVID-19.
Seeking Medicare coverage and payment for in vitro diagnostic tests for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 or the diagnosis of the virus that causes COVID-19.
Seeking Medicare coverage and payment for in vitro diagnostic tests for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 or the diagnosis of the virus that causes COVID-19.
Seeking Medicare coverage and payment for over-the-counter in vitro diagnostic tests for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 or the diagnosis of the virus that causes COVID-19, and other contagious viruses.
